entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.0°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
